title: Is there a physical description of the mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: From our perspective on Earth, mind is universal. The universe for us is the Solar System and the greater universe is that Milky Way Galaxy. The One infinite and universal creation is all universe’s working as One which is beyond our perception and understanding. The void of mind is in a state of flux. Consciousness develops so that there is infinite consciousness potential. Humans are endowed and endow themselves with a conscious mind to direct the nature, shape and form of their creations. Each individual human being has their own unique consciousness which they develop from their experience’s and free will choices.

Whether ‘matter’ is physical or in thought form, or as emotions, or as willpower: it is all Energy and therefore its definition is “Wave power.” For example: It is the capture of energy of wind waves to do useful work – for example, electricity generation, water desalination, or pumping water. A machine that exploits wave power is a wave energy converter. Wikipedia
